project.name: opencode-mystatus
project.tagline: AI Platform Quota at a Glance
project.description: OpenCode plugin for checking account quota usage across multiple AI platforms including OpenAI, Zhipu AI, Z.ai, Google Cloud, and GitHub Copilot. Visual progress bars show remaining quota with real-time reset countdown timers.

features.title: Why opencode-mystatus?
features.subtitle: Stop logging into multiple platforms. One command to check all your AI quota status.

list.title: Multi-Platform Integration
list.desc: Supports OpenAI, Zhipu AI, Z.ai, Google Cloud, and GitHub Copilot. No need to log in separately.

list.title: Visual Progress Bars
list.desc: Intuitive progress bars display remaining quota at a glance. Plan your API usage wisely.

list.title: Reset Time Countdown
list.desc: Real-time countdown to quota reset for each platform. Schedule your development work accordingly.

list.title: Local & Secure
list.desc: Reads only local auth files. No data upload. API keys are automatically masked for privacy.

list.title: Dual Usage Modes
list.desc: Use /mystatus slash command or natural language queries. Check quota anytime, anywhere.

list.title: Bilingual Support
list.desc: Auto-detects system language. Seamless switching between Chinese and English interfaces.
